explanation: [0-0] A large crowd in red clothing is crammed into a narrow street. A man in red at the front is taking pictures with his phone, his camera facing a woman with her chin resting on her hand. The woman is also wearing a long red robe and has long black hair. On both sides of the street are white walls, green storefronts, and various billboards.

[0-4] The crowd dances to the rhythm of the drums. The woman at the front raises and lowers her hands in front of her, while the man next to her holds a green banknote in one hand and sways to the rhythm.

[0-4] The crowd dances to the rhythm of the drums. The woman at the front raises and lowers her hands in front of her, while the man next to her holds a green banknote in one hand and sways to the rhythm.

[4-12] The man holding the banknote turns around slowly, raising one hand and waving the other with the note in front of him. Then, he crosses his hands and makes a gesture as if conducting the music. Behind him is a woman in a yellow dress, her mouth open in a joyful expression, one hand raised in the air as she moves to the music.

[12-16] A woman in a peach-colored dress in the crowd takes her shawl off her arm and puts it on her shoulder. At this moment, the man with the banknote turns around again, raises both hands, and swings his body left and right to the beat of the drums. The woman in the red robe next to him mimics drumming with her hands, then smooths her hair back from her forehead.
